title: Leaden Gaming LF Many positions!!
body:
Leaden Gaming is an amateur Lague team and we take parts in regular tournaments and scrims, notably the weekly sumsoc ladder. We are looking for members in pretty much all positions, but mostly top, mid and jg. If you are interested please message me on league: Split Pushen.
The team is Plat-Dia so you must be at least platinum, Rank and team experience will be favored.

You will probably start as a sub (all subs will still play in scrims) and will be given a main position on the team if you prove yourself.

Any coaches or managers that are willing to gain experience please also add me as we are looking for those spots as well.

replies.body: I'm also making a high elo D4+ team, maybe we can help each other

Hi there,

Just added you in game. Plat 5 and play JG - looking for some team experience and the opportunity to learn from others this year.
